Package com.deco2800.game.components.weapons

Class Scepter

java.lang.Object
com.deco2800.game.components.Component
com.deco2800.game.components.weapons.MeleeWeapon
com.deco2800.game.components.weapons.Scepter
public class Scepter
extends MeleeWeapon
Represents the scepter used by entities. Main difference to its superclass is that scepter uses scepter-related assets, and also has a strong attack which shoots a projectile.

  • Field Summary

    • update

      public void update()
      Description copied from class: MeleeWeapon
      Update uses timer to synchronise attack with animation. Assumes that animation has only 3 frames.
      Overrides:

    • rangedAttack

      public void rangedAttack​(int attackDirection)
      Attacks using an AOE (meleeWeapon.CENTER) direction. The attack will connect with any enemies immediately around the entity.
      Overrides:
      rangedAttack in class MeleeWeapon

    • triggerAttackStage

      protected void triggerAttackStage​(long timeSinceAttack)
      Implements functionality for strong attacks, also plays attack sound during attack frame (for both light and strong).
      Overrides:
      triggerAttackStage in class MeleeWeapon
      Parameters:
      timeSinceAttack - the time elapsed since the entity last attacked 0 - if the entity is not attacking.
      See Also:
      MeleeWeapon

    • onCollisionStart

      protected boolean onCollisionStart​(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.Fixture me, com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.Fixture other)
      Plays impact sound if weapon successfully collides with enemy.
      Overrides:
      onCollisionStart in class MeleeWeapon
      Parameters:
      me - - the fixture used to represent this weapon
      other - - the fixture that our weapon is colliding with.
      Returns:
      true - if weapon collided with enemy target false - otherwise.
      See Also:
      MeleeWeapon
